程序包 com.geometry.service

类 Task4

java.lang.Object
com.geometry.service.Task4
public class Task4 extends Object
Business logic for Task4 - Circle Area and Circumference Calculations. This class manages different types of circle calculations (area and circumference) using both radius and diameter. It handles random value generation, answer validation, and visual representation of the problems.

  • 方法详细资料

    • selectType

      public boolean selectType(String type)
      Select a calculation type and generate a new problem. Generates random parameter value and calculates the expected answer.
      参数:
      type - The type of calculation (area/circumference by radius/diameter)
      返回:
      true if type selection was successful

    • checkAnswer

      public boolean checkAnswer(double userAnswer)
      Check if user's answer is correct within acceptable margin of error. Awards points based on remaining attempts if correct.
      参数:
      userAnswer - The answer provided by the user
      返回:
      true if answer is correct (within 0.01 margin), false otherwise

    • getCurrentType

      public String getCurrentType()
      Get the current calculation type.
      返回:
      Current calculation type string

    • getValue

      public int getValue()
      Get the current parameter value (radius or diameter).
      返回:
      Current value used in calculation

    • getAnswer

      public double getAnswer()
      Get the expected answer for current calculation.
      返回:
      Expected answer

    • getRemainingAttempts

      public int getRemainingAttempts()
      Get remaining attempts for current problem.
      返回:
      Number of attempts remaining

    • isAllCompleted

      public boolean isAllCompleted()
      Check if all calculation types have been completed.
      返回:
      true if all four types (area/circumference by radius/diameter) are completed

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Reset the task state. Clears completed types, resets attempts, and current type.

    • createDisplayPanel

      public JPanel createDisplayPanel()
      Create visual panel for current calculation type. Returns appropriate visualization panel based on current calculation type.
      返回:
      JPanel containing visual representation of the problem

    • getFormula

      public String getFormula()
      Get the formula for current calculation type.
      返回:
      Mathematical formula as string (e.g., "A = π × r²")

    • getParamLabel

      public String getParamLabel()
      Get the parameter label for current calculation type.
      返回:
      Label indicating whether value is radius or diameter
